text: “ Ocean ’ s 8 ” star Sandra Bullock said she considered quitting acting and leaving Hollywood altogether after facing sexist behavior. “ I was like, ‘ Wow, maybe I need to step out of here. Maybe I need to do something else for a living,'” the actress told USA Today. “ And that was in the middle of when I was getting work — I didn ’ t want to be a part of that world where there was that experience. ” This weekend, Bullock will star “ Ocean ’ s 8, ” the all - female reboot of “ Ocean ’ s 11 ” and Bullock ’ s first starring role since 2015 ’ s “ Our Brand Is Crisis. ” Early tracking has its opening weekend set at roughly $ 30 million.
